body:
Comment 4: 
syscall.Stat_t is different on different operating systems. Windows version of
syscall.Stat_t doesn't have Size field. But it is very rare that someone needs to use
syscall package directly.

Perhaps you're want File.Stat() from os package instead:

http://golang.org/pkg/os/#File.Stat

It returns pointer to os.FileInfo that does have Size on all platforms.
